00017 #define GR_UT_LEAF                                      0x0001

00021 #define GR_UT_LEAF_EMPTY                        0x0002

00025 static unsigned int kTotalTileCount[ 12 ] =
00026 {
00027         1,
00028         5,
00029         21,
00030         85,
00031         341,
00032         1365,
00033         5461,
00034         21845,
00035         87381,
00036         349525,
00037         1398101,
00038         5592405,

00045 //----------------------------------------------------------
00046 GrUTAtlas::GrUTAtlas( unsigned int* tileUsage, unsigned int baseChunk )
00047 : _chunk( 0 )
00048 , _invDepth( 11 )
00049 , _flags( 0 )
00050 {
00051         unsigned int totalTileCount = GR_UBERTEX_MAX_SIZE_IN_TILES * GR_UBERTEX_MAX_SIZE_IN_TILES;
00052         BuildTreeFast( tileUsage, totalTileCount );
00053         CalcTileAddress( baseChunk, totalTileCount );
00054 }
00055 
00056 //----------------------------------------------------------
00057 GrUTAtlas::GrUTAtlas( unsigned int* tileUsage, unsigned int maxTileCount, unsigned int depth )
00058 : _chunk( 0 )
00059 , _invDepth( depth )
00060 , _flags( 0 )
00061 {
00062         BuildTreeFast( tileUsage, maxTileCount );
00063 }

00065 //----------------------------------------------------------
00066 GrUTAtlas::GrUTAtlas( UBitReader& bitReader, unsigned int maxTileCount, unsigned int depth )
00067 : _chunk( 0 )
00068 , _invDepth( depth )
00069 , _flags( 0 )
00070 {
00072         B_ASSERT( maxTileCount <= 16 );
00073 
00075         UBitReader laBitReader = bitReader;
00076         unsigned int start = laBitReader.ReadBits( 1 );
00077         unsigned int i = 1;
00078         for ( ; i < maxTileCount; ++i )
00079         {
00080                 if ( laBitReader.ReadBits( 1 ) != start )
00081                         break;
00082         }
00083 
00085         if ( i != maxTileCount )
00086         {
00089                 unsigned int childInvDepth = _invDepth - 1;
00090                 unsigned int childMaxTileCount = maxTileCount >> 2;
00091                 unsigned int c = childMaxTileCount / 32;
00092                 _children[ 0 ] = new GrUTAtlas( bitReader, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00093                 _children[ 1 ] = new GrUTAtlas( bitReader, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00094                 _children[ 2 ] = new GrUTAtlas( bitReader, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00095                 _children[ 3 ] = new GrUTAtlas( bitReader, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00096         }
00097         else
00098         {
00100                 _flags = GR_UT_LEAF;
00101                 _flags |= ( ( start == 0 ) ? GR_UT_LEAF_EMPTY : 0 );
00102 
00104                 _children[ 0 ] = 0;
00105                 _children[ 1 ] = 0;
00106                 _children[ 2 ] = 0;
00107                 _children[ 3 ] = 0;
00108 
00110                 bitReader.SkipBits( maxTileCount );
00111         }
00112 }

00117         delete _children[ 0 ];
00118         delete _children[ 1 ];
00119         delete _children[ 2 ];
00120         delete _children[ 3 ];
00121 }

00129 unsigned int
00130 GrUTAtlas::FindTileChunk( unsigned short mip, unsigned short x, unsigned short y ) const
00131 {
00132         return FindTileChunkInternal( mip, x << mip, y << mip );
00133 }

00135 //----------------------------------------------------------
00136 unsigned int
00137 GrUTAtlas::GetMaxTileCount() const
00138 {
00139         return kTotalTileCount[ _invDepth ];
00140 }

00142 //----------------------------------------------------------
00143 bool
00144 GrUTAtlas::IsLeaf() const
00145 {
00146         return ( _flags & GR_UT_LEAF ) != 0;
00147 }
00148 
00149 //----------------------------------------------------------
00150 bool
00151 GrUTAtlas::IsEmpty() const
00152 {
00153         return ( _flags & GR_UT_LEAF_EMPTY ) != 0;
00154 }

00176 //----------------------------------------------------------
00177 unsigned int
00178 GrUTAtlas::FindTileChunkInternal( unsigned short mipLevel, unsigned short x, unsigned short y ) const
00179 {
00182         if ( IsEmpty() )
00183                 return 0;
00184 
00187         if ( mipLevel == _invDepth )
00188                 return _chunk;
00189 
00192         unsigned int relAddr = _chunk;
00193         if ( !IsLeaf() )
00194         {
00196                 unsigned int childDepth = _invDepth - 1;
00197                 unsigned int bx = ( x >> childDepth ) & 1;
00198                 unsigned int by = ( y >> childDepth ) & 1;
00199 
00201                 relAddr = _children[ ( by + by ) | bx ]->FindTileChunkInternal( mipLevel, x, y );
00202         }
00203         else
00204         {
00206                 unsigned int curMip = _invDepth;
00207                 while ( curMip-- > mipLevel )
00208                 {
00210                         relAddr += 1;
00211 
00213                         unsigned int mx = ( x >> curMip ) & 1;
00214                         unsigned int my = ( y >> curMip ) & 1;
00215                         relAddr += ( ( my + my ) | mx ) * kTotalTileCount[ curMip ];
00216                 }
00217         }
00218 
00220         return relAddr;
00221 }
00222 
00223 //----------------------------------------------------------
00224 void
00225 GrUTAtlas::BuildTreeFast( unsigned int* tileUsage, unsigned int maxTileCount )
00226 {
00229         B_ASSERT( maxTileCount >= 64 );
00230         
00232         unsigned int* src = tileUsage;
00233 
00235         unsigned int tileCount = maxTileCount;
00236         unsigned int start = src[ 0 ] + 1;
00237         while ( tileCount > 0 )
00238         {
00240                 unsigned int curValue = ( *src++ ) + 1;
00241                 if ( curValue > 1 || curValue != start )
00242                         break;
00243                 tileCount -= 32;
00244         }
00245 
00247         if ( tileCount != 0 )
00248         {
00251                 unsigned int childInvDepth = _invDepth - 1;
00252                 unsigned int childMaxTileCount = maxTileCount >> 2;
00253                 unsigned int c = childMaxTileCount / 32;
00254                 if ( childMaxTileCount >= 64 )
00255                 {
00256                         _children[ 0 ] = new GrUTAtlas( tileUsage + 0 * c, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00257                         _children[ 1 ] = new GrUTAtlas( tileUsage + 1 * c, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00258                         _children[ 2 ] = new GrUTAtlas( tileUsage + 2 * c, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00259                         _children[ 3 ] = new GrUTAtlas( tileUsage + 3 * c, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00260                 }
00261                 else
00262                 {
00263                         UBitReader bitReader( ( unsigned char* )tileUsage, maxTileCount );
00264                         _children[ 0 ] = new GrUTAtlas( bitReader, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00265                         _children[ 1 ] = new GrUTAtlas( bitReader, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00266                         _children[ 2 ] = new GrUTAtlas( bitReader, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00267                         _children[ 3 ] = new GrUTAtlas( bitReader, childMaxTileCount, childInvDepth );
00268                 }
00269         }
00270         else
00271         {
00273                 _flags = GR_UT_LEAF;
00274                 _flags |= ( ( *tileUsage == 0 ) ? GR_UT_LEAF_EMPTY : 0 );
00275 
00277                 _children[ 0 ] = 0;
00278                 _children[ 1 ] = 0;
00279                 _children[ 2 ] = 0;
00280                 _children[ 3 ] = 0;
00281         }
00282 }

00284 //----------------------------------------------------------
00285 void
00286 GrUTAtlas::CalcTileAddress( unsigned int& startAddress, unsigned int sizeInTiles )
00287 {
00289         if ( _flags & GR_UT_LEAF_EMPTY )
00290                 return;
00291 
00294         _chunk = startAddress++;
00295 
00298         if ( _flags & GR_UT_LEAF )
00299         {
00302                 while ( sizeInTiles > 1 )
00303                 {
00304                         startAddress += sizeInTiles;
00305                         sizeInTiles >>= 2;
00306                 }
00307         }
00308         else
00309         {
00311                 unsigned int childSize = sizeInTiles >> 2;
00312                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00313                         _children[ i ]->CalcTileAddress( startAddress, childSize );
00314         }
00315 }
